title: 2015 Performance of Alvin Ailey American Theater
desc: Join old friends and new at a wonderful evening of dance  to benefit the Steffi Nossen Dance Foundation  presented by the ? ?Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater Steffi Nossen secures tickets a special group rate for great seats in the Orchestra and Front Mezzanine. Don't miss out on this opportunity to watch the most famous modern dance company in the world perform! Our Master Class I and II dancers are invited to a special Master Class taught by famed Horton technique teacher, Milton Myers from 4:30-6:00pm. Please call the office for details. Carpools can be arranged. Please make a note when you purchase your tickets. ? PrograM ? Grace One of the most popular works in the Ailey repertory, Ronald K. Brown?s spellbinding  Grace  is a fervent tour-de-force depicting individuals on a journey to the promised land.? Alvin Ailey?s? Memoria? is a deeply personal work and one of his most affecting.? Mr. Ailey said that nearly all of his dances had some basis in a relationship, feeling or event that he experienced. ?In the case of? Memoria,? choreographed in 1979, his motivation was the death of his dear friend and colleague, Joyce Trisler. ? Choreographer: Paul Taylor
